name: Pinghetto
description:
It is an adorable, retro-style (pixel-art) platform game.

It's currently in developing-stage (only the first 4 levels).
Try it and send me your comments.

Controls:

"Left Arrow" key -> LEFT

"Right Arrow" key -> RIGHT

Z or SPACE or "Up Arrow" key -> JUMP

X key -> throw the FIRE-BALL

PS: you can use Joystick and Joy-Pad too.
